content: knit row rs and 4 unworked stitches at the end of the purl row ws last rs row 5 yb knit to 1 st before the marker slip the st to rhn remove marker on lhn slip the stitch back to the lhn end with k2og k4 last ws row 6 sl 1 pwise purl to 1 st before the marker remove the marker end p2tog p3 175sts short row are completed next the eyelet border… 2 border a squared edge top border b curved edge bottom eyelet border a this border will give you squared off edge row 1 rs knit row 2 ws knit row 3 sl 1 * k2tog yo* repeat from * end k1 row 4 purl row 5 purl row 6 purl eyelet border b this border will give you rounded curved edges row 1 bobble 2 knit to end 173 row 2 bobble 3 knit to end 170 row 3 bobble 2 *k2tog yo* repeat from to last 3 sts end k2tog k1 167 row 4 bobble 2 purl entire row 165 row 5 bobble 2 purl entire row 163 row 6 bobble 2 purl entire row 161 bind off using p2tog bobble as follows *p2tog slip st on rhn to lhn* repeat from * until all sts are bound off weave in ends 3
